title: Ticket #3056: Schedd should automatically trigger a reschedule when job goes idle
description:
After condor_submit submits a new job, it sends a reschedule command to the schedd to have it notice the new job and initiate trying to get it running. #3026 describes one case where a reschedule isn't sent and the job is ignored until the schedd's periodic check of the job queue. We have seen other cases in the past.

The schedd should be smart enough to figure out for itself when it needs trigger a reschedule event. This would be when a new job is submitted or when a held job is released.
